course_description: This course focuses on clinical pharmacology for common pediatric disease conditions. Emphasis is on the variability and diversity of absorption, distribution and elimination of therapeutic agents and how to monitor effects and toxicities of drugs. Medication calculations will be reviewed.
prerequisites: NRSG 522 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1479, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: S. Close, Status: Open
